sourcesContent: import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import BackgroundHome from '../../images/bgHome.jpg' import { Combobox, ComboboxInput, ComboboxPopover, ComboboxList, ComboboxOption } from '@reach/combobox' import { FaRegPaperPlane } from 'react-icons/fa' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/Home'; import { english as englishTourList, vietnamese as vietnameseTourList } from '../../Languages/TourList' import './TourList.scss' function TourList({ languageSelected }) { const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const optionSideBar = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishTourList : vietnameseTourList) const [optionPrice, setOptionPrice] = useState(0) const [optionCategory, setOptionCategory] = useState(0) const tours = [ { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour Tam Chúc và Tràng An - 1 ngày', price: 123455 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour Bái Đính và Tràng An - 1 ngày', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, { image: BackgroundHome, name: 'Tour ABC', price: 123456 }, ] const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND', currencyDisplay: 'none' }); const numberOfPage = tours.length / 16 return (
